testcase.name: Authentication API › User Registration › should register a new user successfully
Authentication API › User Registration › should reject registration with invalid email
Authentication API › User Registration › should reject registration with short password
Authentication API › User Registration › should reject duplicate registration
Authentication API › User Login › should login with valid credentials
Authentication API › User Login › should reject login with wrong password
Authentication API › User Login › should reject login with non-existent user
Authentication API › Token Refresh › should refresh access token
Authentication API › Token Refresh › should reject invalid refresh token
Authentication API › Token Validation › should validate a valid access token
Authentication API › Token Validation › should reject invalid access token
Authentication API › Token Validation › should reject missing authorization header
Authentication API › Gateway Auth Routes › should proxy auth registration through gateway
Authentication API › Gateway Auth Routes › should proxy auth login through gateway
Feed API › Feed Listing › should get empty feed initially
Feed API › Feed Listing › should support pagination
Feed API › Feed Listing › should handle invalid page parameters gracefully
Feed API › Feed Item Creation › should create a feed item
Feed API › Feed Item Creation › should reject feed item without caption
Feed API › Feed Item Creation › should reject feed item with invalid URL
Feed API › Feed Item Retrieval › should get a specific feed item
Feed API › Feed Item Retrieval › should return 404 for non-existent item
Feed API › Feed Item Update › should update a feed item
Feed API › Feed Item Deletion › should delete a feed item
Feed API › Feed Likes › should like a feed item
Feed API › Feed Likes › should unlike a feed item
Feed API › Gateway Feed Routes › should proxy feed list through gateway
Feed API › Gateway Feed Routes › should proxy feed creation through gateway
Service Health Checks › Gateway service is healthy
Service Health Checks › Auth service is healthy
Service Health Checks › Feed service is healthy
Service Health Checks › Notification service is healthy
Service Health Checks › All services respond within acceptable time
testcase.system-out: Gateway responded in 26ms Auth responded in 8ms Feed responded in 6ms Notification responded in 5ms

testcase.name: Service Health Checks › Metrics endpoints are accessible
Service Health Checks › Ready endpoint works
End-to-End User Journeys › Complete User Registration and Feed Journey › Step 1: User registers successfully
End-to-End User Journeys › Complete User Registration and Feed Journey › Step 2: User logs in with credentials
End-to-End User Journeys › Complete User Registration and Feed Journey › Step 3: User browses the feed

End-to-End User Journeys › Complete User Registration and Feed Journey › Step 7: User updates their post
End-to-End User Journeys › Complete User Registration and Feed Journey › Step 8: User can refresh their token
End-to-End User Journeys › Multi-User Interaction › Two users can interact with the same feed item
End-to-End User Journeys › Error Handling Journey › User receives proper error for invalid registration
End-to-End User Journeys › Error Handling Journey › User receives proper error for invalid login
End-to-End User Journeys › Error Handling Journey › User receives 404 for non-existent feed item
End-to-End User Journeys › Error Handling Journey › User receives error for invalid feed data
